dmca.title: [EV1-C2025089T] Pakistan v West Indies Series 2006 infringments- EchoStar_NRID14109
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page in question any of the material that you
claim is being infringed as of 10:04:32 a.m. (GMT-6).

Legal Response Team
ThePlanet.com

MIME element (text/plain)
Echostar: Pakistan v West Indies Series 2006 infringments- EchoStar_NRID14109 
 
NetResult Internal Reference:  EchoStar_NRID14109 
 
Please quote the above EchoStar_NRID14109 reference in all communications with us
regarding this issue. 
 
 
 
Dear Sirs, 
 
We write on behalf of EchoStar Satellite L.L.C. ("EchoStar") which owns and/or
controls broadcast rights in North America for Pakistan v West Indies Series 2006. 
  
We have noticed that your website, http://www.pkrocks.com/ is displaying, promoting
and/or offering A/V content from the Pakistan v West Indies Series 2006. 
 
We wish to make you aware that your present, unauthorized display of such A/V
content is an infringement of EchoStar's exclusive intellectual property rights
under national and international copyright laws.  On behalf of EchoStar, I hereby
demand that you immediately cease all such infringements on any and all web sites
(and elsewhere) and confirm to NetResult within two (2) business days of the date of
this letter, via return email, that you have done so.  Your failure to comply with
this demand will expose to you civil and criminal liability.  Govern yourself
accordingly.  
  
Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an express or
implied waiver of any of EchoStar's rights or remedies, all of which are expressly
reserved. 
  
Formal Declaration 
 
I Sebastian Taylor, hereby state that EchoStar are the owners of the exclusive
rights to the A/V content referenced above and that NetResult is authorized to act
on EchoStarÃ¯Â¿Â½s behalf with respect to internet monitoring and compliance
related to infringement of such rights. 
 
On behalf of EchoStar, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of
such A/V content in the manner complained of is not authorized by EchoStar, its
agents, or the law. 
 
We thank you for your timely and full cooperation. 
 
Yours sincerely, 
           Sebastian Taylor 
 
 
NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA 
 
Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB 
 
Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please accept our
apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail immediately to the
correct person or department for action.
